USE `mydb` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `mydb`.`department`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`department` (
  `depNo` INT NOT NULL,
  `depName` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`depNo`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `mydb`.`working`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`working` (
  `workNo` INT NOT NULL COMMENT '근무일련번호',
  `date` INT NULL COMMENT '기간',
  `position` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `depNo` INT NULL,
  `empNo` INT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`workNo`),
  INDEX `depNo_idx` (`depNo` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `empNo_idx` (`empNo` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `position_idx` (`position` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `empNo`
    FOREIGN KEY (`empNo`)
    REFERENCES `mydb`.`employee` (`empNo`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `depNo`
    FOREIGN KEY (`depNo`)
    REFERENCES `mydb`.`department` (`depNo`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `position`
    FOREIGN KEY (`position`)
    REFERENCES `mydb`.`employee` (`position`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `mydb`.`employee`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`employee` (
  `empNo` INT NOT NULL,
  `empName` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `position` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `depNo` INT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`empNo`),
  INDEX `depNo_idx` (`depNo` ASC) VISIBLE,
  UNIQUE INDEX `position_UNIQUE` (`position` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `depNo`
    FOREIGN KEY (`depNo`)
    REFERENCES `mydb`.`department` (`depNo`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `position`
    FOREIGN KEY ()
    REFERENCES `mydb`.`working` ()
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `mydb`.`dependents`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`dependents` (
  `depenNo` INT NOT NULL COMMENT '일련번호',
  `depenName` VARCHAR(45) NULL COMMENT '부양가족이름',
  `depenAge` INT NULL COMMENT '부양가족 나이',
  `empNo` INT NULL COMMENT '직원번호',
  PRIMARY KEY (`depenNo`),
  INDEX `empNo_idx` (`empNo` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `empNo`
    FOREIGN KEY (`empNo`)
    REFERENCES `mydb`.`employee` (`empNo`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;

USE `newcompany_db` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `newcompany_db`.`department`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `newcompany_db`.`department` (
  `depNo` INT NOT NULL,
  `depName` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`depNo`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `newcompany_db`.`employee`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `newcompany_db`.`employee` (
  `empNo` INT NOT NULL,
  `empName` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `depno` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `position` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`empNo`),
  INDEX `depno` (`depno` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `employee_ibfk_1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`depno`)
    REFERENCES `newcompany_db`.`department` (`depNo`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
